name: Serpent-less Swizzle

ingredients.name: Powers 12 Year Old Special Reserve Irish Whiskey

preparation:
The classic Caribbean Rum Swizzle gets an Irish whiskey makeover for a tropical St. Patrick's Day drink.

Add all the ingredients to a Pilsner glass.

Fill with crushed ice and swizzle vigorously until slightly frothy.

Garnish with a large sprig of mint and a pickled cherry.
